channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: America's Sweethearts
channel.desc: When Kiki helps facilitate a final public appearance between her famous boss and her estranged husband, she experiences an unexpected spark of attraction and falls for him.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: World's Greatest Dad
channel.desc: After a dramatic twist of fate, high school English teacher Lance Clayton gets a second chance to fulfil his dream of becoming a famous writer.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Mile 22
channel.desc: James Silva, an intelligence officer, is tasked with the operation of a high profile case. As he leads his team to retrieve the asset, they strive to overcome challenges.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Horizon Line
channel.desc: While on a flight, former lovers, Sara and Jackson, discover that the pilot has passed away due to a heart attack and they must find a way to fly the plane on their own.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Out of the Furnace
channel.desc: Russell, a mill worker, tries to protect his younger brother, Rodney, from every harm. However, when the latter disappears, Russell decides to take matters into his own hands.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Tai Chi Hero
channel.desc: Lu Chan is still trying to find his place in his new home, but his presence in Chen Village triggers a curse on the town.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Unfinished Business
channel.desc: Dan starts his own business with Timothy and Mike but lands in unexpected chaos during a crucial deal in Europe, where unpredictable challenges threaten their success.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Hotel Mumbai
channel.desc: A hotel staff risks everything to keep its patrons safe during a terror attack, especially a British heiress, her husband and her infant.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Vanguard
channel.desc: Qin, an accountant living in the UK, is targeted by the leader of a terrorist organisation. His only hope for survival is Vanguard, an elite security company.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Chef vs Fridge
channel.desc: Thinking outside the box is not going to cut it. These chefs must think inside the mystery refrigerator to prove their culinary skills and creativity.

channel.desc: Thinking outside the box is not going to cut it. These chefs must think inside the mystery refrigerator to prove their culinary skills and creativity.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Mask of Zorro
channel.desc: Don De la Vega sets out as the Zorro to avenge his wife's murder and find his daughter. During his mission, he is aided by his successor, Alejandro, who also has his own agenda.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Spotlight
channel.desc: Martin Baron joins the Boston Globe as an editor and pushes four journalists to pursue a story about the child molestation charges against the local church.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Wrecker
channel.desc: Best friends Emily and Lesley are on a road trip in the middle of a desert when they come across a psychotic truck driver who forces them into a dangerous game of cat and mouse.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: S.W.A.T.
channel.desc: When a drug lord offers a huge reward to anyone who can get him out of prison, the SWAT team in Los Angeles, USA is tasked with preventing the escape.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Dragged Across Concrete
channel.desc: When two overzealous policemen get suspended from the force, they take it upon themselves to explore the criminal underworld.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Girl Next Door
channel.desc: A teenage boy's dreams come true when an attractive girl moves into the house next door. They fall in love, but then he discovers she is a former adult film star.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Civil War
channel.desc: In a dystopian future set in America, a team of journalists embark on a perilous journey to reach Washington before rebel factions seize the White House.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Naked Weapon
channel.desc: When 40 young girls are kidnapped, a CIA is put in charge of the case but he does not get any leads. Later, a series of assassinations makes him suspect a connection between the cases.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: 2036 Origin Unknown
channel.desc: After a deadly Mars mission crash, mission controller Mackenzie Wilson discovers a mysterious Mars object that could change our planet's future.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Hummingbird Project
channel.desc: Anton and Vincent, two ambitious cousins, develop a strategy to tap stock market data a millisecond faster, which will help them beat their opposition and yield a tremendous profit in the process.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Who Am I
channel.desc: A lonely hacker who dreams of being a superhero becomes part of a cyber group. However, his life turns upside down when the group becomes involved in causing a threat to national security.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Please Stand By
channel.desc: Wendy, a young woman with autism, runs away from her caregiver and embarks on a journey of a lifetime in order to submit her manuscript to a screenwriting competition.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Chef vs Fridge
channel.desc: Chefs Ajay Chopra and Shipra Khanna try to incorporate Gochujang, a fermented paste used in Korean cuisine, in delicious dishes. Meanwhile, Rahul and Shubham encounter new challenges.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Chef vs Fridge
channel.desc: Gaurav Gera and Chef Vicky organise a fun activity for Chef Disha and Chef Aditi. Later, Chef Disha and Chef Aditi prepare theme-based dishes to win the competition.

channel.title: Philadelphia
channel.desc: A young Philadelphia lawyer who is infected with AIDS keeps his homosexuality hidden from his employers. When he is suddenly dismissed, he hires a homophobic lawyer for a wrongful dismissal suit.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Hotel Transylvania: Transformania
channel.desc: When Van Helsing's invention goes awry, Johnny turns into a monster and Dracula becomes human. Later, they embark on a journey to find a cure before their transformations become permanent.

channel.title: Vincent N Roxxy
channel.desc: An unlikely romance develops between Vincent, a loner, and Roxxy, a rebel, while they are on the run to save their lives. However, their violent past seems to catch up with them wherever they go.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Beekeeper
channel.desc: A retired teacher commits suicide when she becomes a victim of a phishing scam. Soon, her tenant is framed as a murderer, who then contacts a mysterious group to catch the real culprits.
